content.prompt: The treaty provisions in the first paragraph were most similar to which of the following?

choices.label: Luther’s Ninety-Five Theses that criticized the papacy in 1517
The Act of Supremacy in 1534 that established the Anglican Church
The decrees of the Council of Trent (1545–1563)

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
